name: Cabinet
description: Cabinet; Attributed to Philippe-Claude Montigny (French, 1734 - 1800, master 1766); Paris, France; about 1785 - 1790; some mounts and marquetry late 17th century; Oak and walnut veneered with ebony, amaranth, brass, pewter, and tortoise shell; gilt-bronze mounts;  bianco e nero antico marble top; 104.8 x 164.1 x 57.2 cm (41 1/4 x 64 5/8 x 22 1/2 in.); 72.DA.71; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
